name: Walk Right For 13 Hours With No Rewards
name_original: Walk Right For 13 Hours With No Rewards
description:
controls:

A - walk left (why would you)

D - walk right (this is what you wanna do)

i made this in literally one afternoon.  you get nothing for playing.  in fact, you are robbed of your time by playing.

if you hold right the whole time, it'll take you exactly 13 hours. unless the game isn't running at 60 fps, then i guess it'll take longer.

i guess you could make up a story for why the ground and sky look the way they do, if you feel like it.
